item.title: LatAm Prompt Daily News Digest - August 12, 2025
item.author: LatAm Prompt News Feed
item.description:
Migrants returning to Venezuela face debt and harsh living conditions

MARACAIBO, Venezuela ? The hands of Yosbelin P?rez have made tens of thousands of the aluminum round gridles that Venezuelan families heat every day to cook arepas.

Source: NBC | Published: Mon, 11 Aug 2025 00:00:00 -0400

Chinese triads and Mexican cartels exploit US cuts to wildlife aid

Criminals involved in trafficking endangered animals are ?loving? the closure of conservation programmes

Source: The Financial Times | Published: Mon, 11 Aug 2025 00:00:00 -0400

The unprecedented feud between the US and Brazil

Two of the world?s largest countries are at odds over the fate of one man: Trump ally Jair Bolsonaro. Can the rift be mended?

Source: The Financial Times | Published: Mon, 11 Aug 2025 00:00:00 -0400
